item.title: How to Care for Your Laptop's Battery
item.description: Almost all mobile computers have a built-in lithium-ion battery. These batteries that seem to last forever at the beginning hold less and less charge as they age. Is there anyway to delay the degradation of lithium batteries? What practices could potentially prolong or harm the lithium batteries found in everyday laptops? This post aims to shed some light on this topic by debunking common battery myths.
